package.name: Exploration Relic
package.desc: Includes an Energy Curio, which grants +20 to your maximum Energy, for one-time only.

package.name: New Adventurer Bundle
package.desc: Includes an Epic Pack, 150 Arcane Dust, four Energy Potions +5, and 1000 gold!

package.name: Super ShardBot (30 Day)
package.desc: Gives 10 Shards, once per day. Also increases the Energy cap by 20! Item lasts 30 days. You can only have one Super ShardBot at a time!

package.name: Drake & Drake's Emporium
package.desc: The famous treasure hunting duo has arrived and is ready to sell their goods! New treasures every 24 hours!

package.name: Black Knight Friday Sale!
package.desc: The Black Knight has taken over the store, ^c0F0E+30% more^cFFFF Shards from all Shard purchases! This weekend only!

package.name: Holiday Shard Sale!
package.desc: The holidays have come! +30% more Shards from all Shard purchases! This weekend only!

package.name: Windsoul Trove Available!
package.desc: Windsoul Trove bundles are now available in the store! Check them out in the Treasure section!

package.name: Goblin Shard Wall
